ResearchProjectDef.label: ApeMechArmors
ResearchProjectDef.description: A probe has been detected in orbit, it seems to be sending signals to the surface, maybe we can decipher the message
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered:
You open a connection to the probe and a recorded message starts to play

Someone with the slimey demeanour of a used bionics salesman claims to represent a trading faction known as Rimatomics.

As he makes his sales pitch giglebits of data begin flooding into the console, he explains that these are blueprints to construct a Rimatomics research bench which you can use to purchase plans for some of their technology or request trade ships.

Check the Rimatomics tab in the architect menu.
